security: Sharing that REINBEING provided CR$ 5,989,000 to ARI CAMPISTA through the RIO TPROODCAP office for use in elections reveals an ongoing covert operation. "REINBEING TOLD BOIZELLE HE PROVIDING CR$ 5,989,000 TO ARI CAMPISTA...THRU RIO TPROODCAP OFFICE FOR USE IN DECEMBER CNTI ELECTIONS."
summary: A cable discusses funding provided to Ari Campista for use in elections and requests details on a parallel election operation to avoid conflict or competition.
summary_one_paragraph: This cable, sent from the Director to Mexico for GER INFO PACT RIOD, relays information that REINBEING informed BOIZELLE about providing CR$ 5,989,000 to Ari Campista, the President of the Guanabara Chemical Workers Federation, through the Rio TPROODCAP office for use in the December elections, specifically to support the Democratic slate. The cable requests operational details from REINBEING regarding their parallel election operation to prevent any conflict or competition among Democrats, while also noting RIOD's intention to provide funds to Hugo Gomes da Costa, who is associated with Campista's group.
title: Funding for Ari Campista in Brazilian Elections
recipient: Mexico for GER INFO PACT RIOD
